description:
Average assessment rates

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
71231 Comparison of non-personal taxes

Definition:
To determine the average assessment rates, the assessment
rates of the municipalities are weighted by the individual
municipalities' actual revenue from the respective
non-personal tax which has been adjusted by the assessment
rate (see category A real property tax, category B real
property tax, trade tax).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Average assessment rates
